meanings.definition: The act of sewing or attaching a decorative piece of fabric onto a larger piece of fabric.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed appliqueing colorful patches onto her quilt.
meanings.sent2: The appliqueing on the pillow added a lovely touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The appliqueing on the dress made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her appliqueing skills turned the plain fabric into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The intricate appliqueing captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The technique of applying a small piece of fabric onto a larger piece to create a design.
meanings.sent1: Using appliqueing, she created beautiful patterns on the fabric.
meanings.sent2: The appliqueing technique allowed for intricate designs on the quilt.
meanings.sent3: Her appliqueing method was so precise, it looked like magic.
meanings.sent4: Appliqueing transformed the plain cloth into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The delicate appliqueing added elegance to the garment.

meanings.definition: The process of adding decorative details to a garment or textile by sewing or attaching pieces of fabric.
meanings.sent1: Her appliqueing of beads and sequins made the dress sparkle.
meanings.sent2: The appliqueing process gave the curtains a unique and stylish look.
meanings.sent3: The appliqueing of flowers on the tablecloth brought a touch of nature indoors.
meanings.sent4: Appliqueing lace onto the veil gave it a romantic feel.
meanings.sent5: The appliqueing of stars on the flag added a patriotic touch.
